summary: Remember that 125 job requirement for the full experience? Well, forget about that now.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]So, hands up if you have honestly ever done the 125 jobs for the Thieves Guild without the use of a mod or some sort of cheat. If you have then I take my hat off to you. Personally, I have never done it, it was just too much to ask so I decided to change that while still being able to play the quest-line.

The following mod is a replacement script that brings the job requirements from 125 down to 25. I have tested this myself by doing 5 jobs each in the major holds in my current play-through.

[b]NOTE: [/b]This mod is for a new game, I have heard word in the comments that it doesn't work on an existing game if you've done more than 5 jobs for the Thieves Guild.[/size]

[size=5][u]Detail[/u][/size]

[size=3]So, with the changes this is how things work. I'll leave in brackets the old amount.

[/size][list][*][size=3]Jeweled Candlestick appears after 5 jobs. (5)[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Ornate Drinking Horn appears after 10 jobs. (15)[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Golden Ship Model appears after 11 jobs. (25)[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Golden Urn appears after 13 jobs. (35)[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Jeweled Goblet appears after 15 jobs. (45)[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Jeweled Pitcher appears after 17 jobs (55)[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Jeweled Flagon appears after 20 jobs. (75)[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Safe appears next after 25 jobs. (125)[/size]
[/*][/list]
[size=5][u]Incompatibilities[/u][/size]

[size=3]This mod replaces the TGREnablerHandlerQuestScript.pex script file so any other mod that does this will be 
incompatible.[/size]

[size=5][u]Nexus Mod Manager Installation
[/u][/size]
[list=1][*][size=3]Download main file via "Download with Manager" button.[/size]
[/*]

[/*]
[/list]

[/size]
